verses.roman:
sei saba līlāra śunite vivaraṇa
vṛndāvana-vāsī bhaktera utkaṇṭhita mana

synonyms: sei—those; saba—all; līlāra—of the pastimes; śunite—to hear; vivaraṇa—description; vṛndāvana-vāsī—the inhabitants of Vṛndāvana; bhaktera—of devotees; utkaṇṭhita—in anxiety; mana—minds.
translation: The devotees of Vṛndāvana were all very anxious to hear those pastimes.
